content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steel Production Area (around position 0,0)
Consists of three stone furnaces:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (4.0, 4.0)

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (around position 9.5, 11.5)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest at position (6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position (7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest
- Assembling machine 1 at position (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at position (12.5, 11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (around position -7.0, 24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network carrying water
- Boiler at position (-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at position (-2.5, 24.5)
- Connected electricity network with small electric poles

### Science Pack Processing (around position 0.5, 30.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position (0.5, 28.5)
- Burner inserter at position (0.5, 30.5)
- Storage chest at position (0.5, 31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Research Technology Errors
- Cannot research already completed technologies (automation, automation-2, electronics, logistics-2, electric-energy-distribution-1, steel-processing)
- Missing prerequisites for advanced technologies:
  - Advanced electronics requires plastics
  - Logistics-3 requires production science pack
  - Battery technology requires sulfur processing
  - Oil processing requires fluid handling
  - Fluid handling requires engine technology
  - Electric engine requires lubricant

### Resource Management
- Ensure sufficient coal is available before attempting to insert into boilers/furnaces
- Monitor and maintain fuel levels in burner devices

### Production Issues
- Electronic circuit production is stalled due to missing ingredients (iron plates and copper cables)
- Ensure proper supply chain of raw materials to assembling machines

### API Usage
- Invalid technology name reference (EngineUnit) - verify correct technology names in API
